component.name: RootPanelSet
component.script:
sub init() m.top.overhang.logoUri = "pkg:/images/bat.png" m.global.panelSet = m.top.panelSet
audio = createObject("roSGNode", "Audio") m.global.audio = audio
m.stationSelectorScreen = m.top.panelSet.createChild("StationSelectorPanel") m.stationSelectorScreen.id = "StationSelectorPanel" m.stationSelectorScreen.translation = [ 40, 30 ]
m.top.panelSet.appendChild(m.stationSelectorScreen) m.top.ObserveField("focusedChild", "focusChanged") m.stationSelectorScreen.setFocus(true) end sub
function focusChanged() print "RootPanelSet#focusChanged"
'm.rowlist.setFocus(true) ' if m.top.panelSet.isInFocusChain() ' m.top.panelSet.setFocus(true) ' end if ' if m.global.panelSet <> invalid AND NOT m.global.panelSet.isGoingBack ' m.rowlist.setFocus(true) ' end if end function
